page.title: 10HISTORY OF GREETWELL HALL
page.content: {FROM THE ROSS COLLECTION {DOMESDAY}ROGER DE BUSLI FROM SVEN THE THE SAXON. 12th.CENTURY-HUGO de LOVELOT. 13th.CENTURY DAYVILL HELD 3 PARTS OF A KNIGHT'S FEE. 1317 ROLF de BASSET DIED 1343. 1362 RICHARD de WILLOUGHBY DIED. 1362 DUKE OF LANCASTER 1404 EDMUND,EARL OF STAFFORD DIED 1460 HUMPHREY,DUKE OF BUCKINGHAM DIED 1479 A LICENCE GRANTED TO BISHOP THOMAS SCOTT(LINCOLN),THOMAS FITZ-WILLIAM & PHILIP COKELAND TO AMORTIZE LANDS & TENEMENTS OF THE MANOR OF{GREETWELL}TO THE DEAN & CHAPTER OF LINCOLN CATHEDRAL. 1550 CHURCH REOPENED,THOMAS STRAW HAVING LARGELY FOOTED THE BILL. 1607 THOMAS DALLISON,KNIGHT LIVED AT GREETWELL MANOR. 1625 WILLIAM DALLISON LIVED AT MANOR.
